org.hibernate.search.spi

Interface SearchFactoryIntegrator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, SearchIntegrator
    Deprecated. 
    Do not use, and immediately migrate all code to use org.hibernate.search.spi.SearchIntegrator.

    @Deprecated
public interface SearchFactoryIntegrator
extends SearchIntegrator
    This interface is a temporary placeholder and will be removed at the next micro release!
